title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Linear and non-linear dielectric, piezo-, pyro- and ferroelectric crystals; structural phase transition. Dipole and thermodynamical theory of orderdisorder and displacive type of phase transition. Structural, dielectric, electrical, spectroscopic and optical properties of ferroelectrics. Ferroelectric devices. Electro-optic modulator, light valves, pyroelectric detectors, transducers, computer memory and display devices, non-volatile devices.
